text: Elsa Bruckmann (23 February 1865 â€“ 7 June 1946), born Princess Cantacuzene of Romania, was the wife of Hugo Bruckmann and tutor of Adolf Hitler.Sherree O. Zalampas, Adolf Hitler: A Psychological Interpretation of His Views on Architecture She held the "Salon Bruckmann". ==References== Category:1865 births Category:1946 deaths Category:Princes and princesses Category:Romanian people
